meanings.definition: To make changes to a written document for accuracy and consistency.
meanings.sent1: She carefully copyedits her essay to fix any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The editor copyedits the manuscript before it goes to print.
meanings.sent3: The student copyedits her homework to ensure it is perfect.
meanings.sent4: The chef copyedits the recipe to make sure it turns out just right.
meanings.sent5: He copyedits his resume to impress potential employers.

meanings.definition: The act of reviewing and correcting errors in a written work.
meanings.sent1: The copyedits on the article improved its quality.
meanings.sent2: She received the copyedits back from the editor.
meanings.sent3: The copyedits on the novel made the author laugh.
meanings.sent4: The copyedits on the report were like a fresh pair of eyes.
meanings.sent5: The copyedits highlighted the mistakes for easy correction.
